MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer: Thanks for all your work, we really appreciate it.

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: 2020.07.01 - updated dna license and AGB, Terms and Conditions. 2020.06.24 - updated Dynamic Applications codesign certificate. 2020.01.01 - new AGB, Terms and Conditions from 2020. 2018.08.24 - dna license defines a Bug Bounty of 25 Euro. 2016.12.02 - win a level and be allowed next strategy.
Program_Info.Limitations: adware free. spyware free. no data gathering. no limitations. includes a 1-year free cc-by-sa (creative commons) license, including free upgrades.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Dynamic Applications is a Strategy Consultancy focusing on Management and Investment Scenarios.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a Strategy Consultancy focussing on Investment Scenarios. To underline our expertise, we develop Predicted Desire, an evolving platform for free business calculations in System Dynamics. We call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Description_450: Dynamic Applications is a Strategy Consultancy focusing on Management and Investment Scenarios. To underline our expertise, we develop Predicted Desire, an evolving platform for free business calculations in System Dynamics. We call them Dynamic Applications.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Dynamic Applications releases The Reverse Experience
The Reverse Experience (T.R.X.) is a Reversi / Othello board game player, including a powerful game-search based optimization engine that allows you for customization of the game's various play strategies, integrated right within the application itself.
The game's evaluation strategies are based on IAGO, the first computer software beating an official human world champion in a board game. It was our target to develop an even better player. See for yourself.
The game contains a link to an article by Paul S. Rosenbloom, where he explains how he set up IAGO with different strategies, their background theory, and how they offer advantages against human systems thinking.
Within Dynamic Applications, this popular children's game will train you to look far ahead. The simpler the rules, the more far you learn to think in advance, which can be very useful with Dynamic Applications.
Software products of Dynamic Applications are intended to be, and remain, adware and spyware free. All we're asking for is 99 ct for the Windows 10 Store App after one (1) year of free and unlimited upgrades, on a voluntary basis. You're testing - it's free.
No Adware, no Spyware, no Server behind, no data gathering. Transparent by design. If you want to be notified of future upgrades, you'll have to follow our blog, or one of our Socialmedia accounts.
At Dynamic Applications, we work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.
Press_Release.Press_Release_Plain:
Dynamic Applications releases The Reverse Experience with dna human statistics world map
Leopoldshoehe, 2017.06.15
The Reverse Experience (T.R.X.) is a Reversi / Othello board game player, including a powerful game-search based optimization engine that allows you for customization of the game's various play strategies, integrated right within the application itself.
The game's evaluation strategies are based on IAGO, the first computer software beating an official human world champion in a board game. It was our target to develop an even better player. See for yourself.
The game contains a link to an article by Paul S. Rosenbloom, where he explains how he set up IAGO with different strategies, their background theory, and how they offer advantages against human systems thinking.
Software products of Dynamic Applications are intended to be, and remain, adware and spyware free.
Within Dynamic Applications, this popular children's game will train you to look far ahead. The simpler the rules, the more far you learn to think in advance, which can be very useful with Dynamic Applications.
No Adware, no Spyware, no Server behind, no data gathering. Transparent by design.
If you want to be notified of future upgrades, you'll have to follow our blog, or one of our #socialmedia accounts. With the game comes our universal creative commons, cc-by-sa style License conditions.
These may change over time, but in any case, we'll grant you a 1-year-license if you download today.
All we're asking for is 99 ct for the Windows 10 Store App after one (1) year of free and unlimited upgrades, on a voluntary basis. You're testing - it's free.
At Dynamic Applications, we work to empower people. We are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain.

English.Keywords: Reversi, Othello, Board, Game, Logic, Game, Strategy, Scenario, eLearning, Simulation, Dynamic Applications, dynamicons, Think far ahead, Sharing Economy
English.Char_Desc_45: The Reverse Experience - Reversi and Othello
English.Char_Desc_80: The Reverse Experience - play Reversi and Othello, select strategy scenarios
English.Char_Desc_250: The Reverse Experience is a very special Reversi / Othello player. It includes a powerful game-search based optimization engine that allows to customize the game's various play strategies.
English.Char_Desc_450: The Reverse Experience is a very special Reversi / Othello player. It includes a powerful game-search engine allowing for customization of the game's various play strategies. The game will select from different strategy scenarios to play against you, depending on the level you choose. So the game play itself will be different, with each level. By winning you can explore new strategies. Includes full docs.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The Reverse Experience is a very special Reversi / Othello player.
It includes a powerful game-search engine allowing for customization of the game's various play strategies. The computer will select from different strategy scenarios that it will play against you, depending on the level you choose. So game play will be different with each level. Everything is fully documented.
Which should make it a little more interesting, we thought, and could also serve as a nice example of board game evaluation theory. This will also introduce you into the field of strategy scenario variation - learn how to choose from a variety of strategic options.
An evaluation window will show you precisely how each move was calculated internally, explain briefly the strategy you're exploring, and you can compare the impact of the different board evaluation strategies on the total move score.
The game's evaluation strategies are based on IAGO, the first computer software beating an official human world champion in a board game. The game contains a link to an article by Paul S. Rosenbloom where he explains how he set up IAGO with different strategies, their background theory, and how they offer advantages against human systems thinking.
The game and its download are free for personal use under the terms of the dna license included with the program's installer.
